titleStmt.title: The Answer of the deputie lieutenants of the countie of Devon to the declaration of Sir Ralph Hopton and other his trayterous adherents that have lately in an hostile manner invaded the said countie and plundered and pillaged many of the inhabitants thereof

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Olton and G. Dexter for Henry Overton and are to be sold at his shop ...,
